com.facebook.buck.parser

Class ParsingContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.parser.AbstractParsingContext
      • com.facebook.buck.parser.ParsingContext

  • @ParametersAreNonnullByDefault
 @Generated(value="org.immutables.processor.ProxyProcessor")
 @Immutable
 @CheckReturnValue
public final class ParsingContext
extends AbstractParsingContext
    Contains objects and information that may be used during processing a parsing request.

    Note that some of the objects in this context may not be used during all of the requests. For this reason this context is created using a builder pattern where only necessary parameters are passed. Some of the parameters are mandatory and they must be passed to the builder() method.

      Builds instances of type ParsingContext.

      • getSpeculativeParsing

        public SpeculativeParsing getSpeculativeParsing()
        Whether speculative parsing is enabled.

        Speculative parsing a special mode of parsing when dependencies of a target are scheduled for parsing ahead of the actual requests for parsing of those targets. This may lead to over-parsing is some case and thus needs to be used in situations when all of the dependencies of requested targets are used later.

        Overrides:
        getSpeculativeParsing in class AbstractParsingContext
